page.title: 08Westfield School,Malpas
page.content: This is a{special school}for children with physical and mental handicaps.There is a{wide range of {disability}in each age group and great range in physical size and strength. Children from Malpas Church in Wales Junior School visit Westfield School regularly.Initially there was complete lack of understanding of{handicapped children and a nervousness about approaching them. Opinions changed gradually during visits.The school is bright,friendly and cheerful with lots of{equipment}and activities. Some children at Westfield have no special awareness and little self control.However,with{patience}and kindness,teachers help each child to develop as far as that child can.
